biography.firstAppearance: (as Impulse) Flash v.2 #91 (June 1994)* (as Kid Flash) Teen Titans v.3 #4 (December 2003)

work.base: Los Angeles, California (previously Manchester, Alabama, briefly Denver, Colorado, then Keystone City, Kansas)

connections.groupAffiliation: Flash Family, Teen Titans, Legion of Super-Heroes; formerly Young Justice
connections.relatives: Barry Allen (Flash II, grandfather), Iris West Allen (grandmother), Don Allen (father), Meloni Thawne (mother), President Thawne (grandfather), Dawn Allen (aunt), Jenni Ognats (cousin), Thaddeus Thawne (clone), Owen Mercer (half-brother), Max Crandall (guardian)
